body:
Following up from https://github.com/rapidsai/cudf/issues/15115 and the implementation for `axis=1`.

We need to implement concatenation of dictionary objects along `axis=0`.

See important context from @shwina here https://github.com/rapidsai/cudf/issues/15115#issuecomment-1961179887

comments.body: @bdice @wence-, tagging you both for visibility here

title: [FEA] Concatenate dictionary of objects along axis=0
